Entries.Marnie: #$c .5#Let's get you inside and warmed up.#Days like this make me grateful for indoor heating.#$e#You did get your animals heaters, yes?

Entries.Town6: Oh, @, heard on the grapevine you're expecting a kid! Have you picked a name yet?
Entries.AnimalShop6: Hey, @, I've heard the good news. When're you expecting the new kid?

Entries.movieTheater: I can't believe a movie theater came to our town! @, you want to come see a movie with me?$h
Entries.Resort_Chair_2: Oh, looking for a nice spot to rest my poor feet.
Entries.Resort_Bar_2: Mmmmm. Say, @, what looks good to you?
Entries.Resort_Pier: Look, @! Look how clear the water is!$h
Entries.Resort_Pier_2: Oh, @, do you think that's a shark?
Entries.spring_12{{YearRemainder}}: Oh, @, I've been so busy lately, getting ready for the egg hunt!#$e#Our hens are working so hard producing all the yummy eggs we need!
Entries.summer_10{{YearRemainder}}: Oh, the luau is tomorrow, isn't it? Mayor Lewis will want us to impress the Governor.$s
Entries.4{{YearRemainder}}: Our hoof trimmer is going to be stopping by in the next few days. Do you want me to see if he has time for you?
Entries.10{{YearRemainder}}: I've got so much work to do...$s
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: Work on the ranch never ends...always have cows to milk, chicken coops to clean, inventory to manage...$s
Entries.17{{YearRemainder}}: Hey, @, I'm having our farrier come by soon. You got any work for him?$h
Entries.fall_15{{YearRemainder}}: Fall is Jas's favorite season. It's when the fairy roses bloom. She loves them.$h%revealtasteJas595

Entries.summer_Mon8: With poor little me trapped between the arg companies, I can barely make any money.$s
Entries.fall_Mon8: They sell you their equipment but forbid you from trying to fix it. How is that fair?$s

Entries.Resort_Bar: Maybe I should get a nice Long Island Iced Tea?
Entries.Resort_Wander: @, you've definitely done well here, this place is lovely!$h
Entries.Resort_Wander_2: Gosh, @, this sand is so clean.$h
Entries.10{{YearRemainder}}: The cows, they need to be milked every day. It makes it hard for ranchers to take any time off.$s
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: I wonder...I wonder how long I can wake up at four AM like this...

Entries.Resort_Bar: Ah, nothing like a nice relaxing day on the beach.$h
Entries.1_2: I try to keep my cows outdoors as much as possible. Keeping them in the pasture is so much better for them.$h
Entries.5_2: There's nothing like nice fresh cows milk in your coffee every morning.$h
Entries.8_2: Animals will always prefer to eat fresh grass from outside, but they'll eat hay if they can't get grass.
Entries.9_2: Shane actually mucked out the cows' pen without me having to remind him yesterday.#$b#I hope that means he's feeling better?$h
Entries.11_2: The Saloon is the only real social activity we have in these parts. Maybe that's not a good thing.$s
Entries.13_2: Maybe I should get Shane season tickets? What's the gridball team he likes again? Was it the {{i18n:sports.team.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08|key=sports_team}} }}?
Entries.15_2: I've been working so hard during aerobics!$h#$b#It's not that farm work isn't hard work, but I enjoy a spot of exercise with friends too.
Entries.17_2: My weekends are Mondays and Tuesdays, mostly. You'll find me behind my counter most other days!
Entries.19_2: With the cost of feed going up like this, I'm not sure how I'll stay in business.$s
Entries.22_2: I mainly raise cows for milk, but I also raise baby animals for sale to other farmers.$h#$b#It's a lot of work, but it's worth it!
Entries.23_2: For cows, I usually raise Braunvieh or Holsteins. But I'm open to raising other breeds!$h
Entries.25_2: Most of my milk I process into cheese. Artisan cheese can fetch a pretty good price these days.$h
Entries.26_2: Back when the town was bigger, we had more ranchers in this here valley too.#$b#The old mayor, the mayor before Lewis, he was also a rancher. Had two hundred head of cattle over yonder.
Entries.27_2: I wasn't much of a girly girl growing up. You really can't be, growing up on a ranch like I did. Too much muck.
Entries.28_2: I found a nice jazz record the last time I was in Grampleton. Should I give it to...no, maybe not...

Entries.Resort_Bar: Mmmm, what should I have? I'm in the mood for something fruity and fun!$h
Entries.1_2: This farm has been in my family for five generations. I'm very proud to be running it.#$e#I'm not sure who'll run this ranch after me.$s
Entries.7_2: There's no eggs better than farm-fresh eggs!$h
Entries.18_2: Cost of feed's going up, but I ain't getting paid any more for my eggs or milk.#$b#@, I think there's collusion going on.$s#$e#Not sure what to do, it's just little old me against all the ag companies.$s
Entries.19_2: I make quite a bit of cheese as well, on my farm.#$b#There's nothing like farm fresh cheese!
Entries.22_2: %Marnie looks tired.#$b#*Yawn*. Oh, @, hi! Just had to get up very early this morning to herd some cows back into their pen.
Entries.23_2: Tried to make some {{Dish}} the other day.#$b#Made a mess of the kitchen and burned it though.$s

Entries.summer_Mon8: Oh, is it another election year already?#$b#Does it really matter if we vote? The Governor's always going to win his election no matter what we do.
Entries.2_2: I do supply some restaurants directly, they prize the fresh eggs and farmmade-cheese.#$b#Of course, I also sell direct to Gus sometimes.
Entries.27_2: Maybe I should pick up some {{i18n: dishes.child.{{Random:01,02,03,04,05,06,07,08}} }} for Jas?
